title.rendered: Safari 4×4 Snorkel SS735HFB Nissan Navara D40 2008-2016 MFD Thailand 2.5L Diesel

content.rendered: Suitable for 2.5L diesel Thai built Nissan Navara D40 (2008-2016). Thoroughly researched, tested and tooled for each unique model of popular 4WD in Australia. Manufactured to the highest standards in durable, UV stable, cross linked polyethylene material and deliver a continuous and cooler supply of air for maximum engine performance. Includes quality fixtures and fittings that deliver superior sealing, OEM levels of presentation and long-term durability. Positively sealed in order to provide the engine with the ultimate in protection during river crossings and dusty desert driving conditions. Drivetech 4×4 is proud to be a distributor of Australian made Safari Snorkels.

excerpt.rendered: Safari 4×4 Snorkel SS735HFB Nissan Navara D40 2008-2016 MFD Thailand 2.5L Diesel
